text: Amolops viridimaculatus, also known as green-spotted torrent frog, Dahaoping sucker frog, and Dahaoping cascade frog, is a species of frog found in Yunnan, China, northern Vietnam, northern Myanmar, and Nagaland, Northeast India; it is also expected to occur in northern Laos. Male frogs measure and females in length. A. viridimaculatus is becoming rare due to habitat loss caused by small-scale agriculture and dam development. ==References== viridimaculatus Category:Frogs of China Category:Frogs of India Category:Amphibians of Myanmar Category:Amphibians of Vietnam Category:Fauna of Yunnan Category:Amphibians described in 1983
title: Amolops viridimaculatus
